channel.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
channel.description:
[center][u][b]The Team[/b][/u]:
Server Developers - Me, Mr Extremez on Mopar & I'm A Boss on R-S. Core Developer - AtomicInt_ helped with stability.
[b][u]When is pre alpha coming out?[/u][/b] Sometime...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6ofJ1.png[/img]
[url=http://www.2006redone.co.cc/title.ws]Visit the Website[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,553789.0.html]Visit the Official Thread[/url]
[u][b]Positions Open[/b][/u]:
Hoster: 0/1 (We need a reliable host that isn't brand new that can show us proof that has a vps or something good to host with) Web Developer: 1/2 (We have a web developer atm, but the website is going to go down soon so we may need a new web developer)
[u][b]Format[/b][/u]:
[b][u]Hoster[/u][/b]:
[code]Msn: Age: Have you hosted before: Hosting Specs: Name: Extra:[/code]
[b][u]Web Developer[/u][/b]:
[code]Age: Name: Years of Experience: Have you made a 2006 site before: Proof of web development: Extra:[/code]

item.title: 2006Redone || Runescape 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Bellend, post:202, topic:446928”]Years of Experience: 4 or 5 not sure…
Proof of Work: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555214.0.html
Extra: I do a lot of work in other languages
Msn: kieran_dev@hotmail.co.uk
If I am accepted I won’t released the source/any code (Say yes or No): No…[/quote]Are you applying for web developer or programmer because that proof is of a website correct?

Updates:

-Varrock Tramp added
-Pure/rune essence added it checks if your a member/non member
-Added 5 fishing req for gertrudes cat (It’s like that in runescape)
-Worked on server packaging some more
-Tutorial island bug fixed

Read full topic

[quote=“Pblord7, post:195, topic:446928”][quote author=Pvm Santa link=topic=549829.msg4035466#msg4035466 date=1341167026]
Years of Experience; 3 years
Proof of Work; i helped code pvp-scapez and pbscape
Msn; pbscapepking@hotmail.com
Skype; bandos.god
Extra; i can code well, i live to work with groups i had alot of my own remakes but i like to get suggestions from others
[/quote]

i don’t see how that’s proof, unless pblord is you.

yes im pblord7 i changed my name because someone hacked my moparscape account -.-

pls help i m hacked.
Lmfao, I’m getting impersonated now? Haha, and really why would I make an MSN named pbscapepking. Sad[/quote]

Imposter! There’s only one way to decide which is real. You’ll both have to put on Live-naked cam shows for the community.

item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Douzle, post:189, topic:446928”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=549829.msg4061200#msg4061200 date=1343439731]

Years of Experience:4
Proof of Work:I don’t have any proof, I’ve coded my own servers before and have been in development teams well its summer now i have alot of free time im looking to code a server and a nice development team and just to be apart of the runescape I loved so much it would be a honour
Extra:
Msn:tylerat1@hotmail.com and my skype is tyler.wiseman123 feel free to add me on one of them or both
If I am accepted I won’t released the source/any code (Say yes or No):NO

Im afraid with no proof of work we cant accept you.

on another note: development will be halted for a couple of days while Andrew is on vacation.
[/quote]^ what he said, but I’m back now.

Andrew, Could you please reply to message.
Thank you.[/quote]Alright done, still looking for people to apply.
